publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1402 James Kelly: Funding of Supporters Direct—That the Parliament notes the comments of the late Scotland football manager, Jock Stein, that "football without fans is nothing"; believes that this sentiment epitomises the work of Supporters Direct; applauds the work of Supporters Direct in saving six clubs, facilitating £2 million cash input to clubs and establishing 35 supporters’ trusts with 15,000 members; recognises the cross-party support for the work of Supporters Direct but notes that its funding is due to run out in March 2008; expresses disappointment that the SNP administration has failed at this point to provide any new funding to Supporters Direct, and calls on the Minister for Communities and Sport to make funding available from April 2008 to allow Supporters Direct to continue its excellent work on behalf of Scotland’s communities.

S3M-1402 Funding of Supporters Direct (lodged on 22 February 2008) Marilyn Livingstone*, Ross Finnie*, Jackie Baillie*, Iain Gray*, Bill Butler*, Johann Lamont*, Marlyn Glen*, Michael McMahon*, Claire Baker*, Margaret Curran*, Cathy Jamieson*, Karen Gillon*, Mary Mulligan*

S3M-1402 Funding of Supporters Direct (lodged on 22 February 2008) Robert Brown*, Cathie Craigie*, John Park*, Elaine Murray*, Jim Tolson*, Ken Macintosh*, Karen Whitefield*, Lewis Macdonald*, Mike Pringle*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Pauline McNeill*, Gil Paterson*, Patricia Ferguson*
S3M-1402 Funding of Supporters Direct (lodged on 22 February 2008) David Whitton*
S3M-1402 Funding of Supporters Direct (lodged on 22 February 2008) Tom McCabe*, Helen Eadie*, Dr Richard Simpson*
S3M-1402 Funding of Supporters Direct (lodged on 22 February 2008) George Foulkes*
S3M-1402 Funding of Supporters Direct (lodged on 22 February 2008) Cathy Peattie*
